articles.title: Neanderthal gene could explain why some ethnic groups suffer worse from Covid than others - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Around half of South Asians, who were at greater risk during the pandemic, carry a mutation of the genes compared to one-fifth of Europeans
articles.content:
Neanderthal genes which protected people from smallpox could be the reason some ethnic groups are more at risk from Covid, a new study suggests.
Throughout the pandemic, South Asians have been at gr… [+1523 chars]

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: ESA's Solar Orbiter captures a huge eruption from the Sun - Daily Mail
articles.description: The burst of radiation erupted from the side of the Sun facing away from Earth and extended millions of miles into space, the European Space Agency said.
articles.content:
A huge eruption from the sun has been caught on camera by the European Space Agency's (ESA) Solar Orbiter probe.
